sql.isNotEmpty:
and BTB.trade_email IN
#partnerIds[]#
BTB.owner IN #owner[]#
BTB.gmt_create >= #gmtCreateStartTime#
BTB.gmt_create <= #gmtCreateEndTime#

isNotEmpty.isEqual:
BTB.owner IN #owner[]# and BTB.buyer_account = #account#
BTB.seller_account = #oppositeAccount#
(BTB.seller_nick LIKE #oppositeNick# OR BTB.seller_fullname LIKE #oppositeNick# )
(BTB.seller_nick LIKE #oppositeFullName# OR BTB.seller_fullname LIKE #oppositeFullName# )
BTB.seller_login_email LIKE #oppositeLoginName#
BTB.gmt_create >= #gmtCreateStartTime#
BTB.gmt_create <= #gmtCreateEndTime#

BTB.owner IN #owner[]# and BTB.seller_account = #account#
BTB.buyer_account = #oppositeAccount#
(BTB.buyer_nick LIKE #oppositeNick# OR BTB.buyer_fullname LIKE #oppositeNick# )
(BTB.buyer_nick LIKE #oppositeFullName# OR BTB.buyer_fullname LIKE #oppositeFullName# )
BTB.buyer_login_email LIKE #oppositeLoginName#
BTB.gmt_create >= #gmtCreateStartTime#
BTB.gmt_create <= #gmtCreateEndTime#

(( BTB.owner IN #owner[]# and BTB.buyer_account = #account#
(BTB.seller_account = #oppositeAccount#)
(BTB.seller_nick LIKE #oppositeNick# OR BTB.seller_fullname LIKE #oppositeNick# )
(BTB.seller_nick LIKE #oppositeFullName# OR BTB.seller_fullname LIKE #oppositeFullName# )
BTB.seller_login_email LIKE #oppositeLoginName#
BTB.gmt_create >= #gmtCreateStartTime#
BTB.gmt_create <= #gmtCreateEndTime#
) OR ( BTB.owner IN #owner[]# and BTB.seller_account = #account#
BTB.buyer_account = #oppositeAccount#
(BTB.buyer_nick LIKE #oppositeNick# OR BTB.buyer_fullname LIKE #oppositeNick# )
(BTB.buyer_nick LIKE #oppositeFullName# OR BTB.buyer_fullname LIKE #oppositeFullName# )
BTB.buyer_login_email LIKE #oppositeLoginName#
BTB.gmt_create >= #gmtCreateStartTime#
BTB.gmt_create <= #gmtCreateEndTime#
))

sql.isNotEmpty: MAE.TICKET_NO_END >= #ticketNo# AND MAE.TICKET_NO_START <= #ticketNo# AND length(MAE.TICKET_NO_END) >= length(#ticketNo#) AND length(MAE.TICKET_NO_START) <= length(#ticketNo#)

operation.name: findTradeBaseForAir
operation.remarks: 航旅交易数据查询(信用支付/全部 )
operation.sql:
SELECT BTB.id,BTB.trade_no,BTB.out_trade_no,BTB.seller_account,BTB.seller_login_email,BTB.buyer_account,BTB.buyer_login_email,BTB.seller_type,BTB.buyer_type,BTB.trade_from,BTB.trade_email,BTB.operator_role,BTB.trade_status,BTB.total_fee,BTB.service_fee_ratio,BTB.service_fee,BTB.currency,BTB.seller_action,BTB.buyer_action,BTB.gmt_create,BTB.seller_user_id,BTB.buyer_user_id,BTB.additional_trd_status,BTB.trade_type,BTB.seller_fullname,BTB.buyer_fullname,BTB.seller_nick,BTB.buyer_nick,BTB.goods_title,BTB.gmt_last_modified_dt,BTB.stop_timeout,BTB.gathering_type,BTB.buyer_marker,BTB.seller_marker,BTB.buyer_marker_memo,BTB.seller_marker_memo,BTB.channel,BTB.product,BTB.pay_channel, MAE.PNR,MAE.TICKET_NO_START,MAE.TICKET_NO_END,MAE.system_partner, MC.loan_success,MC.pay_success FROM trade_base BTB left join mcenter_air_ext MAE on BTB.trade_no = MAE.trade_no AND MAE.owner IN #owner[]# left join mcenter_creditpay MC on BTB.trade_no = MC.trade_no AND MC.pay_success = 'Y' WHERE 1 = 1
MC.pay_success = 'Y'
order by BTB.GMT_CREATE ASC
order by BTB.GMT_CREATE DESC
order by BTB.GMT_LAST_MODIFIED_DT ASC
order by BTB.GMT_LAST_MODIFIED_DT DESC

operation.name: countAndSumTradeBaseForAir
operation.remarks: 航旅交易数据汇总查询(信用支付/全部 )
operation.sql:
SELECT count(BTB.trade_no) count,sum(BTB.total_fee) sum_amount FROM trade_base BTB left join mcenter_air_ext MAE on BTB.trade_no = MAE.trade_no AND MAE.owner IN #owner[]# left join mcenter_creditpay MC on BTB.trade_no = MC.trade_no AND MC.pay_success = 'Y' WHERE 1 = 1
MC.pay_success = 'Y'

operation.name: findTradeBaseForAirByBalance
operation.remarks: 航旅交易数据查询(余额支付)
operation.sql:
SELECT BTB.id,BTB.trade_no,BTB.out_trade_no,BTB.seller_account,BTB.seller_login_email,BTB.buyer_account,BTB.buyer_login_email,BTB.seller_type,BTB.buyer_type,BTB.trade_from,BTB.trade_email,BTB.operator_role,BTB.trade_status,BTB.total_fee,BTB.service_fee_ratio,BTB.service_fee,BTB.currency,BTB.seller_action,BTB.buyer_action,BTB.gmt_create,BTB.seller_user_id,BTB.buyer_user_id,BTB.additional_trd_status,BTB.trade_type,BTB.seller_fullname,BTB.buyer_fullname,BTB.seller_nick,BTB.buyer_nick,BTB.goods_title,BTB.gmt_last_modified_dt,BTB.stop_timeout,BTB.gathering_type,BTB.buyer_marker,BTB.seller_marker,BTB.buyer_marker_memo,BTB.seller_marker_memo,BTB.channel,BTB.product,BTB.pay_channel, MAE.PNR,MAE.TICKET_NO_START,MAE.TICKET_NO_END,MAE.system_partner FROM trade_base BTB left join mcenter_air_ext MAE on BTB.trade_no = MAE.trade_no AND MAE.owner IN #owner[]# WHERE 1 = 1
and not exists (select 1 from mcenter_creditpay MC where MC.trade_no = BTB.trade_no and MC.pay_success = 'Y')
order by BTB.GMT_CREATE ASC
order by BTB.GMT_CREATE DESC
order by BTB.GMT_LAST_MODIFIED_DT ASC
order by BTB.GMT_LAST_MODIFIED_DT DESC

operation.name: countAndSumTradeBaseForAirByBalance
operation.remarks: 航旅交易数据汇总查询(余额支付)
operation.sql:
SELECT count(BTB.trade_no) count,sum(BTB.total_fee) sum_amount FROM trade_base BTB left join mcenter_air_ext MAE on BTB.trade_no = MAE.trade_no AND MAE.owner IN #owner[]# WHERE 1 = 1
and not exists (select 1 from mcenter_creditpay MC where MC.trade_no = BTB.trade_no and MC.pay_success = 'Y')

sql.isNotEmpty:
BTF.owner IN #owner[]#
BTF.gmt_trade_create >= #gmtTradeCreateStartTime#
BTF.gmt_trade_create <= #gmtTradeCreateEndTime#
and BTF.partner_id IN
#partnerIds[]#

isNotEmpty.isEqual:
BTF.owner IN #owner[]# and BTF.pay_account_no = #account#
BTF.gmt_trade_create >= #gmtTradeCreateStartTime#
BTF.gmt_trade_create <= #gmtTradeCreateEndTime#
BTF.receive_account_no = #otherAccountNo#

BTF.owner IN #owner[]# and BTF.receive_account_no = #account#
BTF.gmt_trade_create >= #gmtTradeCreateStartTime#
BTF.gmt_trade_create <= #gmtTradeCreateEndTime#
BTF.pay_account_no = #otherAccountNo#

( (BTF.owner IN #owner[]# and BTF.pay_account_no = #account#
BTF.receive_account_no = #otherAccountNo#
BTF.gmt_trade_create >= #gmtTradeCreateStartTime#
BTF.gmt_trade_create <= #gmtTradeCreateEndTime#
) OR (BTF.owner IN #owner[]# and BTF.receive_account_no = #account#
BTF.pay_account_no = #otherAccountNo#
BTF.gmt_trade_create >= #gmtTradeCreateStartTime#
BTF.gmt_trade_create <= #gmtTradeCreateEndTime#
))

sql.isNotEmpty: MAE.TICKET_NO_END >= #ticketNo# AND MAE.TICKET_NO_START <= #ticketNo# AND length(MAE.TICKET_NO_END) >= length(#ticketNo#) AND length(MAE.TICKET_NO_START) <= length(#ticketNo#)

operation.name: findTradeFundBillForAir
operation.remarks: 退款明细查询(全部，信用支付）
operation.sql:
SELECT BTF.bill_no,BTF.trade_no,BTF.out_order_no,BTF.pay_account_no,BTF.receive_account_no,BTF.currency,BTF.amount,BTF.type,BTF.status,BTF.channel,BTF.gmt_pay,iw_trans_log_id,BTF.gmt_trade_create,BTF.gmt_create,BTF.gmt_modified,BTF.memo,bank_pay_online_id,bank_amount,bank_type,freeze_type,partner_id,deposit_id, PNR,MAE.TICKET_NO_START,MAE.TICKET_NO_END,MAE.system_partner, MC.loan_success,MC.pay_success, seller_account,seller_login_email,buyer_account,buyer_login_email,seller_type,buyer_type,trade_from,trade_email,operator_role,trade_status,total_fee,service_fee_ratio,service_fee,seller_action,buyer_action,seller_user_id,buyer_user_id,additional_trd_status,trade_type,seller_fullname,buyer_fullname,seller_nick,buyer_nick,goods_title,gmt_last_modified_dt,stop_timeout,gathering_type,buyer_marker,seller_marker,buyer_marker_memo,seller_marker_memo,product,pay_channel from trade_fund_bill BTF left join mcenter_air_ext MAE on BTF.trade_no = MAE.trade_no AND MAE.owner IN #owner[]# left join mcenter_creditpay MC on BTF.trade_no = MC.trade_no AND MC.pay_success = 'Y' inner join trade_base BTB on BTB.trade_no = BTF.trade_no AND BTB.owner IN #owner[]# WHERE BTF.owner IN #owner[]#
MC.pay_success = 'Y'
order by BTF.GMT_CREATE ASC
order by BTF.GMT_CREATE DESC
order by BTF.GMT_PAY ASC
order by BTF.GMT_PAY DESC
order by GMT_MODIFIED ASC
order by GMT_MODIFIED DESC

operation.name: findTradeFundBillForAirByBalance
operation.remarks: 退款明细查询(余额支付)
operation.sql:
SELECT BTF.bill_no,BTF.trade_no,BTF.out_order_no,BTF.pay_account_no,BTF.receive_account_no,BTF.currency,BTF.amount,BTF.type,BTF.status,BTF.channel,BTF.gmt_pay,iw_trans_log_id,BTF.gmt_trade_create,BTF.gmt_create,BTF.gmt_modified,BTF.memo,bank_pay_online_id,bank_amount,bank_type,freeze_type,partner_id,deposit_id, PNR,MAE.TICKET_NO_START,MAE.TICKET_NO_END,MAE.system_partner, seller_account,seller_login_email,buyer_account,buyer_login_email,seller_type,buyer_type,trade_from,trade_email,operator_role,trade_status,total_fee,service_fee_ratio,service_fee,seller_action,buyer_action,seller_user_id,buyer_user_id,additional_trd_status,trade_type,seller_fullname,buyer_fullname,seller_nick,buyer_nick,goods_title,gmt_last_modified_dt,stop_timeout,gathering_type,buyer_marker,seller_marker,buyer_marker_memo,seller_marker_memo,product,pay_channel from trade_fund_bill BTF left join mcenter_air_ext MAE on BTF.trade_no = MAE.trade_no AND MAE.owner IN #owner[]# inner join trade_base BTB on BTB.trade_no = BTF.trade_no AND BTB.owner IN #owner[]# WHERE BTF.owner IN #owner[]#
and not exists (select 1 from mcenter_creditpay MC where MC.trade_no = BTF.trade_no and MC.pay_success = 'Y')
order by BTF.GMT_CREATE ASC
order by BTF.GMT_CREATE DESC
order by BTF.GMT_PAY ASC
order by BTF.GMT_PAY DESC
order by GMT_MODIFIED ASC
order by GMT_MODIFIED DESC

operation.name: findCreditpayRefundDetail
operation.remarks: 信用支付退款明细分页查询
operation.sql:
SELECT BTF.trade_no,out_order_no,pay_account_no,receive_account_no,BTF.currency,BTF.amount refundAmount,type,status,BTF.channel,gmt_pay,iw_trans_log_id,BTF.gmt_trade_create,BTF.gmt_modified,BTF.memo,bank_pay_online_id,bank_amount,bank_type,freeze_type,partner_id,deposit_id, PNR,MAE.TICKET_NO_START,MAE.TICKET_NO_END,MAE.system_partner, MC.bill_no,MC.TRANS_DATE,MC.TRANS_ACCOUNT_OUT,MC.TRANS_ACCOUNT_IN,MC.CUSTOMER_ID,MC.BIZ_NAME,MC.OPERATOR_ID,MC.OPERATOR_NAME,MC.loan_success,MC.pay_success, MC.amount amount,BTF.gmt_trade_create gmt_create from trade_fund_bill BTF left join mcenter_air_ext MAE on BTF.trade_no = MAE.trade_no AND MAE.owner IN #owner[]# inner join mcenter_creditpay MC on BTF.trade_no = MC.trade_no AND MC.pay_success = 'Y' WHERE
query not allowed
BTF.owner IN #owner[]# AND BTF.receive_account_no = #transAccountIn#
BTF.gmt_trade_create >= #gmtTradeCreateBegin#
BTF.gmt_trade_create <= #gmtTradeCreateEnd#
BTF.gmt_pay >= #gmtPayBegin#
BTF.gmt_pay < #gmtPayEnd#
BTF.TRADE_NO = #tradeNo#
MC.bill_no = #billNo#
MC.AMOUNT = #amount#
MC.TRANS_DATE = #transDate#
MC.TRANS_ACCOUNT_OUT = #transAccountOut#
MC.CUSTOMER_ID = #customerId#
MC.BIZ_NAME = #bizName#
MC.OPERATOR_ID = #operatorId#
MC.OPERATOR_NAME = #operatorName#
MC.MEMO = #memo#
MC.RECORD_STAMP = #recordStamp#
MC.loan_success = #loanSuccess#
MC.pay_success = #paySuccess#
MAE.pnr = #pnr#
MAE.TICKET_NO_END >= #ticketNo# AND MAE.TICKET_NO_START <= #ticketNo# AND length(MAE.TICKET_NO_END) >= length(#ticketNo#) AND length(MAE.TICKET_NO_START) <= length(#ticketNo#)
BTF.out_order_no = #outTradeNo#
BTF.type IN
#fundFlowTypes[]#
order by BTF.gmt_trade_create DESC,gmt_pay DESC
